column4: Can anybody comment generally on the quality of Intrepid AMD64?  I ran Gutsy AMD64 and I ended up switching to 32-bit because it seemed too buggy.  However, now, I have just upgraded to a Phenom Quad-core with 8GB RAM, and I'm thinking about trying 64-bit again.
I just preparing to install Intrepid AMD64 o.o
Well, we'll be there for each other :-)
I am now still in Edgy, no support anymore :( ... so I will install Intrepid soon...
